name: As The Shade
description:
As The Shade

Run, jump and slash though 25 fun levels designed to make you scream!

Slice your enemies and watch them explode in colorful explosions!

Glide to victory using your parachute!

You can play with an xbox controller, if you have one !

Twitter: https://twitter.com/_smallphil (Follow me for tweets about gamedev and my games) Feedback is super appreciated :)

My other games: http://petitp00.itch.io/
